response.original_title: The Little Rascals: The Complete Collection
response.overview: For the first time, all 80 Original Theatrical Shorts of the groundbreaking comedy classic The Little Rascals are now available in one complete collection - digitally restored in their original release order.  This 8-disc Collection contains fascinating commentaries, insightful behind-the-scenes features, fond memories shared by cast members and 3 of the very first Our Gang silent shorts.
response.title: The Little Rascals: The Complete Collection
